comment.body:
@piquark6046 If this can be fixed by ELC, we should fix as well. Scriptlet does not work on all AG platforms.
@zloyden The rule was added by https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/118348, was there some issue by cosmetic rule?
